action.primary: Invigorates and cools the Blood, circulates Qi and stops bleeding

indications: Blood Stagnation with bleeding, hematochezia, hemoptysis, hematuria, metrostaxis and metrorrhagia
Bleeding due to External trauma, clavus
Malignant furuncle, incised wound and deep-rooted boil

action.primary: Drains Dampness, promotes urination and promotes lactation

indications: Bacillary dysentery, jaundice, colitis and enteritis
